abstract.description: Survey and qualitative comparison of energy-efficient technologies for 5G networks.

detail.context: Energy efficiency in 5G is crucial for sustainability and cost reduction.
detail.approach: Reviewed multiple technologies and classified them according to energy-saving potential.
detail.solution_description: Provided a qualitative comparison and recommendations for 5G deployment.
detail.cons_and_improvements_ideas: Could include quantitative analysis for more impact.
